Uses of Class
A3JGroups.A3JGMessage

    • Uses of A3JGMessage in A3JGroups

      Methods in A3JGroups that return types with arguments of type A3JGMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<A3JGMessage> JGFollowerRole.getMessageOverTime()
      This function is used to retrieve messages left in memory on ReplicatedHashMap.
      Methods in A3JGroups with parameters of type A3JGMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void JGSupervisorRole.messageFromFollower(A3JGMessage msg)
      This function must be extended in order to define the behavior of the supervisor when receives a message from the follower.
      abstract void JGFollowerRole.messageFromSupervisor(A3JGMessage msg)
      This function must be extended in order to define the behavior of the follower when receives a message from the supervisor.
      int JGSupervisorRole.sendMessageOverTime(A3JGMessage mex, java.util.List<org.jgroups.Address> dest, int days, int hours, int minutes)
      You have to use this function to send message, that will be saved over time, to followers.
      boolean JGSupervisorRole.sendMessageToFollower(A3JGMessage mex, java.util.List<org.jgroups.Address> dest)
      You have to use this function to send message to followers.
      boolean JGFollowerRole.sendMessageToSupervisor(A3JGMessage mex)
      You have to use this function to send message to the supervisor.
      boolean JGFollowerRole.sendUpdateToSupervisor(A3JGMessage mex)
      This function is used to send an update to the supervisor, using a message.
      abstract void JGSupervisorRole.updateFromFollower(A3JGMessage msg)
      This function must be extended in order to define the behavior of the supervisor when receives an update from the follower.
